channel.title: Where To Declare to load a gfx

item.title: Where To Declare to load a gfx
item.dc:creator: @nathanrr44 nathanrr44
item.description:
@nathanrr44 wrote:

well basically ive got a stupid while skull instead of a red one for my veng. i had this issue previously when i had a server a few years back. Back then all i did was add a file to my raw folder in my cache and it changed.

so i downloaded a model this time tried putting this in spotanim

if(j == 604){//Red skull cache[j].anInt405 = 12411; cache[j].anInt406 = 4417; cache[j].aAnimation_407 = Animation.anims[cache[j].anInt406]; }

im using xyle source if that helps, and that code didnt fit in very well with everytjing else + i recieved multiple compile errors.

Read full topic
item.source: Where To Declare to load a gfx
